note.p: Death: His residence at Windsor, Berkshire (08 September 1798)
Burial: St George's Chapel, Windsor, Berkshire
Education: Westminster School; Trinity College, Cambridge (Matriculated 1734); Lincoln's Inn (1734)
Career: Called to the Bar (1738); Recorder of Liverpool (1742-1798); Bencher of Lincoln's Inn (1763); Constable of Flint Castle (1775); MP for Ilchester, Somerset (1775-1780)
